hero.headline: About GRRAS Solutions
hero.subtext: Empowering students with world-class IT education and industry-ready skills since 2014

about.mission: To provide world-class IT education and training that bridges the gap between academic learning and industry requirements. We are committed to nurturing skilled professionals who can excel in the rapidly evolving technology landscape.
about.vision: To be the leading IT training institute in India, recognized for excellence in education, innovation in teaching methodologies, and success in producing industry-ready professionals who contribute to the global technology ecosystem.
about.story: GRRAS Solutions Training Institute has been empowering students with world-class IT education since 2014. We offer industry-relevant courses, recognized degrees, and guaranteed placement assistance.

values.title: Quality Education
values.description: We provide world-class IT education with industry-relevant curriculum and hands-on experience.

values.title: Student Success
values.description: Our students success is our priority. We ensure every student gets proper guidance and support.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously update our courses and teaching methods to match industry standards.

values.title: Industry Focus
values.description: Our training programs are designed based on current market demands and industry requirements.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: GRRAS Solutions established with a vision to provide quality IT education in Jaipur.

timeline.title: Industry Partnership
timeline.description: Partnered with leading IT companies for internships and placement opportunities.

timeline.title: BCA Program Launch
timeline.description: Launched industry-integrated BCA degree program with specializations.

timeline.title: Red Hat Authorization
timeline.description: Became authorized Red Hat training partner for official certifications.

timeline.title: Cloud Excellence
timeline.description: Established state-of-the-art cloud labs and DevOps training infrastructure.

timeline.title: AI/ML Integration
timeline.description: Integrated AI/ML modules across all programs to meet future technology needs.

courses.title: DevOps Training
courses.oneLiner: Master Modern DevOps Practices & Cloud Technologies
courses.description: Comprehensive DevOps training covering the complete DevOps lifecycle, cloud platforms, containerization, orchestration, and automation tools used in modern software development.
outcomes: Master AWS cloud services and deployment strategies
Implement CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab
Container orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Ansible

seo.description: Learn DevOps at GRRAS Solutions Jaipur. Master AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins and more.

courses.title: BCA Degree Program
courses.description: A comprehensive 3-year BCA degree program designed with industry integration, covering modern technologies like cloud computing, DevOps, and AI/ML along with traditional computer science fundamentals.
outcomes: Strong foundation in computer science and programming
Expertise in modern technologies and cloud platforms
Industry-ready skills for software development roles

faqs.question: Do you provide placement assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 100% placement assistance with our network of 100+ hiring partners including top IT companies.

faqs.question: What are the admission requirements?
faqs.answer: For our degree programs, you need 12th pass. For professional courses, basic computer knowledge is preferred but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do you offer EMI options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide flexible EMI options for all our courses. Contact our admission team for details.
